basics.name: Shlok Kamat
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.Tech in Electrical and Electronics Engineering in the Department of Electrical Engineering at Shiv Nadar University. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

education.institution: Shiv Nadar University, G.B Nagar, U.P.
courses: Basics of electrical and electronics engineering

work.summary: Game testing for a startup under Atal Incubation Mission (AIM), NITI AAYOG, Govt. of India
highlights: Tested mobile games across various platforms and gained extensive knowledge of game development processes
Used exploit testing to find, reproduce and accurately report 30+ issues in detailed bug reports
Communicated with the developers the steps to improve the game physics by 28%
Observed everyday functioning of the engineering department at ITC Maurya-New Delhi, Sheraton-New Delhi and ITC Grand Bharat, Manesar
Studied the use of sustainable engineering practices in the hospitality industry and how it could be applied to other industries
Undertook training on MICROS Property Management System (PMS) to aid the engineering department

volunteer.summary: Supervising and overseeing social media advertising campaigns for the club website
highlights: Creating and publishing of relevant, original, high-quality content for club events
Learning new tools to manage content.
Technical Member, Roboyantriki, Varsity Robotics Club, 2020-Present

awards.title: Dean's List Recipient
awards.summary: The Dean's List rewards academic excellence (Top 10% of the class) in a particular semester. The awardee serves as role a models for the entire SNU community.
